videos.description: Kristaps Porzignis drives through the lane and drops a vicious dunk on Jarrett Allen.

tracking.trackingName: NBA_One-Play (Porzingis throws down filthy poster dunk) 2021/11/30 ESHEET

videos.headline: Porzingis throws down filthy poster dunk

videos.description: Kristaps Porzingis protects the paint twice in a short span to keep the Mavericks close.

tracking.trackingName: NBA_One-Play (Kristaps gets back-to-back blocks in tremendous fashion) 2021/11/30 ESHEET

videos.headline: Kristaps gets back-to-back blocks in tremendous fashion

videos.description: Kristaps Porzingis makes a nice pass to Moses Brown who slams home the dunk.

videos.description: Jarrett Allen catches the lob from Darius Garland and emphatically slams it home.
